email.subject: Your account might have been compromised

body.header: Your account might have been compromised
texts: In a recent scan, we found that your email address was mentioned in a recent breach of user information.
This does not necessarily mean that your password has been compromised, but for security reasons we do recommend that you change it.
For more information about the breach, click one of the links next to the relevant breaches below.
previous_breach_texts: Your account has also been in previous, older breaches. You can find a complete list below.
